verses.verse: It is reported<WG191> commonly<WG3654> that there is fornication<WG4202> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> such<WG5108> fornication<WG4202> as<WG3748> is<WG3687> not so much<WG3761> as named<WG3687> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484>, that<WG5620> one<WG5100> should have<WG2192> his father's<WG3962> wife<WG1135>.

And<WG2532> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> puffed up<WG5448>, and<WG2532> have<WG3996> not<WG3780> rather<WG3123> mourned<WG3996>, that<WG2443> he that hath done<WG4160> this<WG5124> deed<WG2041> might be taken away<WG1808> from<WG1537> among<WG3319> you<WG5216>.

For<WG1063> I<WG1473> verily<WG3303>, as<WG5613> absent<WG548> in body<WG4983>, but<WG1161> present<WG3918> in spirit<WG4151>, have judged<WG2919> already<WG2235>, as<WG5613> though I were present<WG3918>, concerning him that hath<WG2716> so<WG3779> done<WG2716> this deed<WG5124>, judged: or, determined

In<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, when ye<WG5216> are gathered together<WG4863>, and<WG2532> my<WG1699> spirit<WG4151>, with<WG4862> the power<WG1411> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>,

To deliver<WG3860> such an one<WG5108> unto Satan<WG4567> for<WG1519> the destruction<WG3639> of the flesh<WG4561>, that<WG2443> the spirit<WG4151> may be saved<WG4982> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>.
Your<WG5216> glorying<WG2745> is not<WG3756> good<WG2570>. Know ye<WG1492> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> a little<WG3398> leaven<WG2219> leaveneth<WG2220> the whole<WG3650> lump<WG5445>?

Purge out<WG1571> therefore<WG3767> the old<WG3820> leaven<WG2219>, that<WG2443> ye may be<WG5600> a new<WG3501> lump<WG5445>, as<WG2531> ye are<WG2075> unleavened<WG106>. For<WG1063> even<WG2532> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> passover<WG3957> is sacrificed<WG2380> for<WG5228> us<WG2257>: is sacrificed: or, is slain

Therefore<WG5620> let us keep the feast<WG1858>, not<WG3361> with<WG1722> old<WG3820> leaven<WG2219>, neither<WG3366> with<WG1722> the leaven<WG2219> of malice<WG2549> and<WG2532> wickedness<WG4189>; but<WG235> with<WG1722> the unleavened<WG106> bread of sincerity<WG1505> and<WG2532> truth<WG225>. the feast: or, holyday
I wrote<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> in<WG1722> an epistle<WG1992> not<WG3361> to company<WG4874> with fornicators<WG4205>:

Yet<WG2532> not<WG3756> altogether<WG3843> with the fornicators<WG4205> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889>, or<WG2228> with the covetous<WG4123>, or<WG2228> extortioners<WG727>, or<WG2228> with idolaters<WG1496>; for<WG1893> then<WG686> must ye needs<WG3784> go<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the world<WG2889>.

But<WG1161> now<WG3570> I have written<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> not<WG3361> to keep company<WG4874>, if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> that is called<WG3687> a brother<WG80> be<WG2228> a fornicator<WG4205>, or<WG2228> covetous<WG4123>, or<WG2228> an idolater<WG1496>, or<WG2228> a railer<WG3060>, or<WG2228> a drunkard<WG3183>, or<WG2228> an extortioner<WG727>; with such an one<WG5108> no not<WG3366> to eat<WG4906>.
For<WG1063> what<WG5101> have I<WG3427> to do to judge<WG2919> them also<WG2532> that are without<WG1854>? do<WG2919> not<WG3780> ye<WG5210> judge<WG2919> them that are within<WG2080>?
But<WG1161> them that are without<WG1854> God<WG2316> judgeth<WG2919>. Therefore<WG2532> put away<WG1808> from<WG1537> among yourselves<WG5216> that<WG846> wicked person<WG4190>.
